text: I _think_ that shouldn’t need the get_asset_url function there

Assuming you’re using a file manager source for the original file. If anything, it would be the reverse, if you needed to resize an image from the project folder… but I’m not sure that would work either
Oh, wait, duh, shouldn't it be reversed?

Yeah, I think the reverse would work. I think get_asset_url is needed though, don't think you can use resize_image_url with local paths. I haven't tried it though tbh. If you haven't figured this out by tonight, I'll look into it for you.

I’m not sure resize_image_url works on images outside the filemanager, but if it does, yes they should be reversed. Also assuming the image is smaller than the limits of that function (4MB or something like that IIRC)
